about_the_game:
Enjoy the original OST for Zelter composed by Syadeu, a young sound designer who has created music for many Korean projects, including Trick Art Dungeon and Battle Sorcerer.

The album contains 7 tracks of various genres that provide outstanding feeling and create a positive mood which is essential for survival in a zombie infested post apocalyptic world.
Zelter is a pixelated crafting survival game. Use your skills to craft tools for survival and defence, scavenge resources, save people, and try not to become a treat for the hordes of zombies!
Zelter Original Soundtrack was created with the help of many artists in South Korea, Guitarist 권남훈, Bassist 신현재, and special thanks to Purple-Rain 양지완.

Credits
Artist: Syadeu
Composer: Syadeu
Label: G1 Playground
Other Credits:
Musics, Mixed, Mastered by Syadeu.
Guitar - 권남훈
Bass - 신현재

name: Zelter Soundtrack
short_description: This is additional content for Zelter, but does not include the base game
